verbs.description: [V: hanging] [ARG1: noose] halloween display angers residents a viewer sent us a picture of halloween decorations in a marietta man yard calling the hanging body offensive the viewer said she was startled by the decoration while going for a walk carl willis marietta georgia halloween caribou place cobb county georgia
